name: EvalSuite
description: A collection of test cases for evaluating an agent. Defines default scorers, thresholds, and execution settings.

schema.name: string (required)
schema.agent_id: string (required) - identifier for the agent being tested

yaml_example:
name: core-tests
agent_id: research-agent
default_scorers:
  - tool_selection
  - reasoning
cases:
  - name: factual_search
    input:
      query: "What is the capital of France?"
    expected_tools:
      - web_search
